summary:
Simplay added a few epic tracks from this link:
http://theanaesthete.bandcamp.com
descriptionHtml:
I thought this album I listened to on bandcamp was incredible (I definately Recommend checking it out at http://theanaesthete.bandcamp.com)
So I simply decided to make it play during Dragon combats, however, I'm new to modding, and this may play for other bosses as well. If theres any problems with it, simply post it in the comments.

To install, simply drag the contents in the winrar file to your Skyrim Data file.

Tracks used:
1. Ryu / Tradition
2. Fudo / The Immovable Deity
3. In & Yo / Dualities of the Way
4. Oku / The Secrets
6. Myo / The Miraculous
7. Hara / The Center
(Didn't add 5, 8, and 9 because I didn't think they were fitting for combat, although they're great tracks.)

Requires:
Skyrim.esp
Update.esp
author: Paragon1101
